Package com.example.dinder

Class VolleySingleton

java.lang.Object
com.example.dinder.VolleySingleton
public class VolleySingleton extends Object
VolleySingleton using Android Volley to manage HTTP Requests being sent to and from the Springboot Server

    Field

    instance
    The instance of the VolleySingleton class; Static so that there are not more than one instances within the app

    The RequestQueue used by Volley to execute requests added to it

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static VolleySingleton getInstance(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the VolleySingleton class, initializing it if necessary.
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context, used for initializing the VolleySingleton if needed.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the VolleySingleton class.

    • getRequestQueue

      public com.android.volley.RequestQueue getRequestQueue()
      Retrieves the request queue for handling network requests. If the request queue is not initialized, it creates a new one using the application's context.
      Returns:
      The request queue used for handling network requests.

    • addToRequestQueue

      public <T> void addToRequestQueue(com.android.volley.Request<T> req)
      Adds a given request to the request queue for execution.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the parsed response this request expects.
      Parameters:
      req - The request to be executed.

    • getImageLoader

      public com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageLoader getImageLoader()
      Retrieves the image loader used for loading and caching images.
      Returns:
      The image loader instance.
